name: Full Stack Web Development
discription: Build real websites from scratch with this beginner-friendly crash course. Learn the complete web development process — from designing pages with HTML and CSS, adding interactivity with JavaScript, and connecting everything to a PHP + phpMyAdmin backend.

name: UI/UX Design MasterClass
discription: The UI/UX Design MasterClass by LearnVeo is built for beginners, creators, and developers who want to design digital products that look stunning and feel effortless. In this course, you’ll master the fundamentals of User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) design—from color theory, typography, and layout systems to wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing.

name: WordPress MasterClass
discription: The WordPress MasterClass by LearnVeo is designed for beginners and aspiring creators who want to build beautiful, responsive, and professional websites—without writing a single line of code. In this course, you’ll learn everything from setting up your domain and hosting to customizing themes, installing plugins, designing pages, and managing your website with ease.

name: Canva MasterClass
discription: The Canva MasterClass by LearnVeo is your complete guide to creating professional graphics and videos — no design background required. This course is perfect for students, creators, freelancers, and business owners who want to level up their visual content skills using one of the most beginner-friendly tools online.

name: AI Tools MasterClass
discription: Unlock the power of Artificial Intelligence in your daily workflow. In this MasterClass, you’ll explore 10+ powerful AI tools designed to boost productivity, creativity, and efficiency. From writing and designing to research, automation, and content creation — this course helps you master the tools shaping the digital world.

name: Excel MasterClass
discription: The Excel Productivity MasterClass is designed to help learners go from basic to brilliant — mastering the most powerful formulas, time-saving shortcuts, and practical tricks used by professionals around the world.

name: PowerPoint MasterClass
discription: LearnVeo’s PowerPoint MasterClass is your complete guide to creating stunning, professional presentations — even if you’ve never designed one before. In this course, you’ll master essential PowerPoint tools, smart shortcuts, and practical design techniques used by pros.
